Description: Data Inconsistency: In config.py, Slot A1 and B2 are set to False (Occupied) but have vehicle_id: None. This causes the UI to show "Occupied" but "Vehicle: None".
Fix Applied: Updated config.py to set all initial slots to True (Available).

Description: Grid Sorting: Slots appear in random order on the frontend because dictionaries are unordered. Slot B1 might appear before A1.
Fix Applied: Added sorting logic in services.py to order slots alphabetically by ID.

Description: Time Sync Error: If the server time is slightly ahead of the client time, the "Just now" calculation shows negative values or incorrect formatting.
Fix Applied: Added a check in script.js to handle time differences gracefully.

Bug ID: REQ-004: Input Validation - The system must validate the Vehicle Identification Number to ensure it complies with standard alphanumeric license plate formats before accepting a booking
